snippet: Simon Johnson, a professor at M.I.T., writes for the Economix blog that the scandal over rate-manipulation at Barclays can be summarized with a phrase coined by Dennis Kelleher of the financial reform advocacy group Better Markets: "Lie More,"...
abstract: Simon Johnson, a professor at M.I.T., writes for the Economix blog that the scandal over rate-manipulation at Barclays can be summarized with a phrase coined by Dennis Kelleher of the financial reform advocacy group Better Markets: "Lie More," instead of Libor.
